V.22bis modem tests

What does it do?

These tests connect two V.22bis modems back to back, through a telephone line model. BER testing is then used to evaluate performance under various line conditions.

If the appropriate GUI environment exists, the tests are built such that a visual display of modem status is maintained.

How is it used?
